entry.title: CCSCodeStandard
entry.summary:
A powerful Roslyn analyzer and code fix provider that enforces consistent VB.NET naming conventions and coding standards to improve code quality and team productivity.

  • Type-based prefixes for 40+ types (str for String, int for Integer, etc.)
  • Field modifiers with g/m prefixes and gc/mc for constants
  • Missing 'As' clause detection with automatic fixes
  • Missing 'dbo.' prefix detection for stored procedures with automatic fixes
  • Default value initialization enforcement
  • Support for variables, fields, parameters, and ForEach loops
  • One-click bulk fixes for team-wide consistency

Compatible with Visual Studio 2019-2022 and .NET Framework projects
